title: Face
creator_credit: Robin Spry, Tom Daly and ONF | NFB
brief_description: This film is a visual experiment, an exploration into the past, present and projected life of a young woman as seen on her face. A broad range of emotions are held up to the camera, both rehearsed and unrehearsed by this professional actress Julie Wildman. (Award: Niagara-on-the-Lake). Photography by Robin Spry and Kjeld Nielsen, sound by John Knight.
